examples.example: 我完全有信心能够完成这项任务。

translate.english: I have full confidence to be able to complete this task.

examples.example: 我对未来的生活充满了期待，完全相信通过自己的努力会过得越来越好。

translate.english: I am full of expectations for the future life and fully believe that through my own efforts, I will live better and better.

examples.example: 我完全沉浸在这美丽的风景中，心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: I am completely immersed in this beautiful scenery, and the mood is extremely comfortable.
